message: #11357 seriously, where's the best place to donate stuff on/near campus? i'd like to be sure that my old (but good quality) clothes, equipment, etc. can actually go to someone in need

#11341 Life is short. Keep your loved ones close. Hug your friends every time you go. Kiss your family goodbye even if you are leaving for an hour. Tell everyone you love that you love them, and make sure they never forget. Don't ever leave with things on a bad note. You just never know when you are going to see someone for the last time. Life is just too precious to undervalue friendship, family, and love.
